body:
Hello all,

This is the OP Manager of 5 Seconds of Pop. We would like to go on tour, but we need a cool outfit! In other words, we would like a skin! 

We we would like something like this.

  • A Elvis Hair Style
  • A Black Leather jacket
  • Sunglasses (the aviator ones ;)
  • And "5sofPop on the back on the jacket in white
Thanks guys!

title: 5sofPop - Help Needed
